entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:37 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
